metadata.title: CVE-2020-23064 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in jQuery 2.2.0 through 3.x before 3.5.0allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via the <options>element.

criterions.comment: jquery: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
